xwikidoc.name: RESTSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: ${services.localization.render('RESTCode.RESTSheet.title.prefix', ["${doc.name}"])}
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('RESTCode.RESTClass')) #set ($discard = $services.localization.use('document', 'RESTCode.RESTTranslations')) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_description">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('description', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('description') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_url">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('url', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('url') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_method">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('method', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('method') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_params">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('params', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('params') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_status">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('status', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('status') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_content-type">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('content-type', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('content-type') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_content-type-format">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('content-type-format', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('content-type-format') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_accept">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('accept', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('accept') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_accept-format">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('accept-format', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('accept-format') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_extensionid">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('extensionid', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('extensionid') ; <label for="RESTCode.RESTClass_0_since">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('since', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('since') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
